content: In approximately three hours the hl7.org server will be going down. The site will be moved to a new server and brought back online after database updates and configuration changes.
The update has been moved to 5 pm
There are known issues with file corruption on download. It is being worked on now.
There are known issues with LOGIN and ACCOUNT CREATION on www.hl7.org. We have had a firewall break on us and are replacing it now. Estimated time to completion is 2 hours.
Login and Account Creation are available. The firewall has been replaced.
